radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild atelectasis at the lung bases, no pleural effusions, heart normal in size with small pericardial effusion, small sliding hiatal hernia, appendix fluid filled and dilated up to 10 mm with mild circumferential wall thickening and mucosal hyperemia, inflammatory fat stranding around the appendiceal tip, scattered prominent mesenteric and retroperitoneal lymph nodes up to 6 mm, scattered colonic diverticula without acute inflammation.
